healthy.title: Healthy Meals
healthy.subheading: Nutritious and balanced meals crafted for your well-being.

items.name: Steamed or Sauteed Chicken with Brown Rice, Broccoli and Veggies
items.description: Lean chicken served with brown rice, broccoli, and fresh veggies – clean, balanced, and filling.

items.name: Sprouts and Mushroom with Capsicum and Veggies
items.description: Protein-rich sprouts and mushrooms tossed with crunchy veggies for a light yet powerful meal.

items.name: Paneer with Brown Rice and Veggies
items.description: Soft paneer paired with wholesome brown rice and seasonal veggies.

healthySubs.title: Healthy Meals Subscriptions for 30 Dishes
healthySubs.subheading: Enjoy a month of healthy eating with our curated meal subscriptions.

items.name: Chicken Salad Meal
items.description: 30 days of fresh, protein-packed chicken salads for consistent healthy eating.

items.name: Sprouts and Mushroom Salad Meal
items.description: Daily bowls of nourishing sprouts and mushrooms – light, fresh, and energizing.

items.name: Paneer Salad Meal
items.description: Creamy paneer salads crafted to keep your meals healthy and exciting.

breakfast.title: Breakfast
breakfast.subheading: Start your day with our wholesome and delicious breakfast options.

items.name: Upma
items.description: Soft, warm semolina cooked with mild spices – simple and comforting.

items.name: Poha
items.description: Light and fluffy poha with gentle spices and a homely touch.

items.name: Idli (3 pcs)
items.description: Soft steamed idlis – light, healthy, and easy on the stomach.

items.name: Sabudana Khichdi
items.description: Classic sabudana cooked with peanuts for a filling breakfast.

items.name: Sabudana Vada (3 pcs)
items.description: Crispy outside, soft inside – golden sabudana vadas.

items.name: Mendu Vada (3 pcs)
items.description: Crispy, fluffy vadas perfect with chai or coffee.

items.name: Pav Bhaji
items.description: Rich, buttery bhaji served with soft pav – street food favorite.

items.name: Dosa
items.description: Thin and crispy dosa made fresh to order.

items.name: Masala Dosa
items.description: Golden dosa filled with spiced potato masala.

items.name: Tea
items.description: Hot, refreshing chai brewed just right.

items.name: Coffee
items.description: Smooth and aromatic coffee to kickstart your day.

veg_starters.title: Veg Starters
veg_starters.subheading: All veg starters are served with mint chutney and salad.

items.name: Mix Veg Starter Plate

items.name: Veg Spring Roll Platter (5 pcs)

items.name: Paneer Spring Roll Platter (5 pcs)

items.name: Veg Tandoori Creamy Samosa Platter (5 pcs)

items.name: Paneer Tikka
items.description: Char-grilled paneer cubes marinated in tandoori spices.

items.name: Paneer Chilli
items.description: Crispy paneer tossed in a spicy Indo-Chinese sauce.

items.name: French Fries
items.description: Golden, crispy fries with a light crunch.
